text: Norbert Nigbur (born 8 May 1948) is a former German football player. He was a goalkeeper and has played six times for the West Germany national team. ==Career statistics== ===Domestic statistics=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League DFB-Pokal Europe DFL-Ligapokal Total League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Schalke 04 1966–67 Bundesliga 28 0 3 0 — — 31 0 1967–68 18 0 1 0 — — 19 0 1968–69 31 0 5 0 — — 36 0 1969–70 23 0 3 0 6 0 — 32 0 1970–71 31 0 2 0 — — 33 0 1971–72 34 0 9 0 — — 43 0 1972–73 34 0 3 0 6 0 9 0 52 0 1973–74 24 0 1 0 — — 25 0 1974–75 33 0 3 0 — — 36 0 1975–76 33 0 2 0 — — 35 0 Total 289 0 32 0 12 0 9 0 342 0 Hertha BSC 1976–77 Bundesliga 33 0 7 0 — — 40 0 1977–78 34 0 6 0 — — 40 0 1978–79 34 0 8 0 10 0 — 52 0 Total 101 0 21 0 10 0 — 132 0 Schalke 04 1979–80 Bundesliga 28 0 5 0 — — 33 0 1980–81 27 0 1 0 — — 28 0 1981–82 2.
